title: Queue blocked because others dodged?
body:
I don't understand what happened. I'll give a play-by-play of what occurred. For reference, this was in normal draft.

>Join queue (declare intent, ban, and wait.)
>Pick champ (Akali in this case).
>Other B.S. happens that I'm not even watching. Someone eventually dodges. K. It happens. Whatever.

>>Next game pop.
>>Same scenario, pick Akali again.
>>Someone dodges, not paying attention as to why. Just wait for next pop, which occurs quite fast.

>>>Third game pops up.
>>>Same scenario, my teammate banned Akali (way after I declared her, whatever).
>>>Pick Malphite (_was set up to play AP champ, wasn't expecting Akali to ever get banned_), lock in.
>>>2 seconds later, someone leaves.

Instead of queuing back in as normal; the game actually told me that because I apparently left, that **I was the one blocked from joining queue**! Quite the opposite, of course. Is there some kind of bug where if your teammates leave your games too many times back to back you get locked out as well?

replies.body: Were you talking about this account specifically? If so, I'm honestly not entirely sure what must be going on. I'm not seeing *any* left or AFK games on this account right now, nor do I see any low priority queues or a history of punishments. Are you still seeing low priority queues? I'd like a screenshot as well if possible, that way we can dig in and really figure out what's going wrong there.
